1_1F4DKSRBpoHN7ueQvkeM5x4AhfE65v3MN3.body:
You have to create a zeronet.conf inside the zeronet directory (if linux), it's fully documented here (http://zeronet.readthedocs.org/en/latest/faq/#is-it-possible-to-install-zeronet-to-a-remote-machine).
Then acces form remote everywhere.
only use user.json if you want to use your ID from an other zeronet install.

1_1L5rGDgTs4W2V7gekSvJNhKa7XaHkVwotD.body:
You have to enable tor first in your usual desktop. Get that 0net only works with last unstable Tor version. But you still have to point to your tor proxy if you use only firefox (unnecessary with tor browser) to anonymize your IP.
Personnaly I use FoxyProxy firefox module to simplify the proxy usage.
